page.title: 20Improvements ST Credits
page.content: {Caldwell}has few amenites and has had no houses built during the last 15 years but most people are satisfied, enjoying the quiet surroundings. Some people would like a village green or play area and a speed limit. { Eppleby}has more amenites but the majority of people would like improvements. The main ones suggested are to have the roads round the green mended, a better bus service, a recreation area for children, to build more houses and improve those in New Row, to plant trees and put benches on the green. {Contributors:- Anthony Allum John Shutt Mark Anderson Rebecca H. Simpson Jennifer Dobinson Matthew Trimble Christian Player Peter Tweddall Johan Rooke Stephen Tweddall Richard Scott M. A. Walton
